article.title: November 2014 Galaxy Newsletter
article.content:
A lot is happening in in the Galaxy in November, and a lot of good stuff happened in October too. Take a look at the November 2014 Galaxy Newsletter for the complete story, but here are some highlights:

  • IRC Channel is Now Publicly Archived
  • Galaxy Training Network Launched = find a trainer near you (and sign up if you do training)
  • Galaxy Days: 2-3 December, Paris
  • Swiss German Galaxy Tour 2014 Report
  • Fall 2014 GUGGO Events Report
  • and 11 other events between now and the end of the year
  • 38 new papers, including 3 featured papers
  • Who's Hiring
  • Two new public Galaxy Servers
  • 35 new ToolShed repos
  • And a smattering of other news too

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
